en: Neither of those books is interesting.
zh: 那两本书都没意思。

en: His comments about the book were favorable.

en: What do you think about the book?

en: You may give the book to whoever wants it.

en: The pasture has an area of 10 acres.

zh: 上面说以后不能踢足球了，谁要是违反了就得坐牢。

en: The answer irritated me.

en: By that, Boeing means that there may also have been other problems, but that an accident could have been avoided if the crew had done their job correctly.
zh: 波音公司的意思是，可能还有其他问题，但如果机组人员操作正确，事故本是可以避免的。

en: I remember hearing the story once.

en: The story concluded abruptly.

en: The story approximates to historical truth.

en: The story is at once interesting and instructive.

en: The story ends with his death.

en: The story is founded on tradition.

en: The story has come down through many years.

en: The story was adapted for the movie.

en: The story ends happily.

en: The tale is familiar to us.

en: The setting of the story is Japan in the late Meiji period.

en: The beginning of the story was interesting.

en: The story has in it something of the element of tragedy.

en: On hearing the noise, my brother started to cry.

en: When did you hear the sound?

en: That dress becomes her very well.

en: That suit wears long.

en: The dress is newly designed.

en: That looks smart on you.

en: That custom is quite foreign to the Japanese.

en: It took me three days to clean the room.

zh: 展览下个月举行。

en: The exhibition was a product of his imagination.
zh: 那个展览是他想象力的产物。

en: The exhibition is well worth a visit.
zh: 那个展览很值得一看。

en: The exhibition is now open.
zh: 展览现在开放了。

en: The exhibition offers profound insights into ancient civilization.
zh: 那个展览让人对古代文明有很深的了解。

en: That observatory stands in a good location.
zh: 那个天文台的位置很好。

en: Three persons were killed and ten were severely or slightly injured in the railway accident.
zh: 那场铁路事故造成3人死亡，10人受了轻重伤。

en: The railroad is now in the process of construction.
zh: 铁路正在修建中。

en: The railroad divides into two after the bridge.
zh: 铁路过桥后分成了两岔。

en: Rust ate away the iron bar.
zh: 生锈腐蚀了那根铁棒。

en: The drowning man grasped at the rope.
zh: 溺水的人抓住了绳子。

en: The burglar is used to staying up late.
zh: 那个小偷习惯了熬夜。

en: The thief was traced by the stolen goods.
zh: 顺着赃物找到了那个贼。

en: The thief ran fast.
zh: 贼跑得飞快。

en: The robber tried to plunge the knife into the boy.
zh: 强盗想拿刀捅那个男孩。

en: The thief admitted his guilt.
zh: 小偷认罪了。

en: The thief ran away at the sight of a policeman.
zh: 那个贼一看到警察就跑了。

en: The thief ran away at the sight of a detective.
zh: 那个贼一看到侦探就跑了。

en: The thief disguised himself as a policeman.
zh: 小偷把自己伪装成了警察。

en: The thief disguised himself as an old lady.
zh: 小偷把自己伪装成了一个老太太。

en: The thief reluctantly admitted his guilt.
zh: 小偷很不情愿地认了罪。

en: How did the thief manage to avoid being caught?
zh: 那个贼是怎么躲过抓捕的？

en: The robber stood surrounded by ten policemen.
zh: 强盗被十个警察包围了。

en: Can you give me a brief description of the thief?
zh: 你能简单描述一下那个小偷的样子吗？

en: Just pass such an insult.
zh: 这种侮辱就随它去吧。

en: That sum of money won't make or mar us.
zh: 那笔钱不至于决定我们的成败。

en: I was not in the least surprised, for I had fully expected as much.
zh: 我一点也不觉得奇怪，因为我早就料到了。

en: That proposal may be a way to kill two birds with one stone, but we also have to be careful not to get greedy and spoil everything.
zh: 那个提议可能是一箭双雕，但我们也得小心，别因为贪心把事情搞砸了。

en: Your offer is very attractive, but we will have to think about it.
zh: 你的提议很有吸引力，但我们得考虑考虑。

en: The proposal met with opposition.
zh: 这个提议遭到了反对。

en: The proposal came up last week.
zh: 这个提议是上周提出来的。

en: Although the proposal seemed like a good idea, they refused it.
zh: 虽然这个提议听起来不错，但他们还是拒绝了。

en: I was unwilling to agree to the proposal, but it seemed that I had no choice.
zh: 我本来不想同意那个提议，但看来也没别的选择了。

en: Are you for or against the proposal?
zh: 你支持还是反对这个提议？

en: We said in unison that we didn't agree to the suggestion.
zh: 我们异口同声地说不同意这个建议。

en: The proposal has its good points as well as its bad ones.
zh: 这个提议有好的一面，也有不好的一面。

en: I agree to the proposal in principle.
zh: 原则上我同意这个提议。

en: The garden is laid out in the Japanese style.
zh: 这个花园是按日式风格布置的。

en: The garden is famous for its irises.
zh: 这个花园以鸢尾花出名。

en: The garden is turning into a wilderness.
zh: 这花园快变成一片荒地了。

en: The garden was surrounded by a wooden fence.
zh: 花园周围围着木栅栏。

en: The garden is at its best in spring.
zh: 春天是这个花园最美的时候。

en: The garden is tended with great care.
zh: 这个花园被打理得非常用心。

en: The garden was filled with flowers.
zh: 花园里开满了花。

en: The garden has been professionally laid out.
zh: 这个花园是找专业人士设计过的。

en: There weren't any roses in the garden.
zh: 花园里没有玫瑰花。

en: There are some pretty flowers in the garden.
zh: 花园里有一些挺漂亮的花。

en: There are all kinds of flowers in that garden.
zh: 那个花园里有各种各样的花。

en: The empire absorbed all the small states.
zh: 那个帝国吞并了所有的小国家。

en: Even the periodical pay raise could not keep abreast of higher living costs.
zh: 就算定期涨工资，也跟不上生活成本的增加。

en: The crane was standing on one leg.
zh: 那只仙鹤正单腿站着。

en: It was the last crane she ever made.
zh: 那是她折的最后一只纸鹤。

en: It was the first of the one thousand cranes that Sadako had to make.
zh: 那是佐佐木祯子要折的一千只纸鹤中的第一只。

en: The angler felt a strong tug on the line.
zh: 钓鱼的人感觉到鱼线被猛地拽了一下。

en: The notice was badly printed.
zh: 那张通知印得很糟糕。

en: That street was very noisy during the day.
zh: 那条街白天特别吵闹。

en: She clearly does not mean it.
zh: 她显然不是那个意思。

en: That street is very noisy.
zh: 那条街非常吵。

en: The street runs along the river.
zh: 这条街沿着河边延伸。

en: The street was empty of people and traffic.
zh: 街上空荡荡的，没人和车。

en: The street was deserted after ten.
zh: 十点以后，街上就没半个人影了。

en: There are many people and cars on that street.
zh: 那条街上人多车多。

en: The street is full of cars.
zh: 街上全是车。

en: The street is very narrow.
zh: 这条街非常窄。

en: The street is paved with asphalt.
zh: 这条街铺的是柏油路。

en: There are stores on each side of the street.
zh: 街道两边都有商店。

en: There are cherry trees on each side of the street.
zh: 街道两边都有樱花树。

en: There's a hotel across the street.
zh: 马路对面有一家酒店。

en: Traffic on the street was really terrible.
zh: 街上的交通状况简直糟透了。

en: There are many stores on either side of the street.
zh: 街道两旁有很多商店。

en: The trees that line the street have lovely blossoms in spring.
zh: 街道两旁的树在春天会开出漂亮的花。

en: There are large houses along the street.
zh: 沿着这条街有很多大房子。

en: The street is named for President Madison.
zh: 这条街是以麦迪逊总统的名字命名的。
